author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This PR proposes a fix to update the `layerStart` taking into account the updated module splitting in barrel pixel layer one. Now, with #47611 this would become obsolete and the fix is also included in that PR itself. It could be anyway useful to have this single fix integrated separately so that the bot tests in #47611 could eventually show any genuine discrepancy w.r.t. master.
title: Fix to D110 Module Counts in `SimplePixelTopology.h`
